text:
Use the following data to answer Questions 8 through 13.
An analyst is conducting a hypothesis test to determine if the mean time spent on
investment research is different from three hours per day. The test is performed at the
5% level of significance and uses a random sample of 64 portfolio managers, where
the mean time spent on research is found to be 2.5 hours. The population standard
deviation is 1.5 hours.
